   1 ######################################################################
   2 package My::RDBO::Advisory;
   3 
   4 use strict;
   5 
   6 use base qw(My::RDBO);
   7 
   8 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
   9     table   => 'advisory',
  10 
  11     columns => [
  12         id         => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
  13         message_id => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  14         app_id     => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  15         version    => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 25, not_null => 1 },
  16         text       => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
  17     ],
  18 
  19     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
  20 
  21     foreign_keys => [
  22         app => {
  23             class       => 'My::RDBO::App',
  24             key_columns => { app_id => 'id' },
  25         },
  26 
  27         message => {
  28             class       => 'My::RDBO::Message',
  29             key_columns => { message_id => 'id' },
  30         },
  31     ],
  32 );
  33 
  34 1;
  35 ######################################################################
  36 package My::RDBO::Advisory::Manager;
  37 
  38 use base qw(Rose::DB::Object::Manager);
  39 
  40 use My::RDBO::Advisory;
  41 
  42 sub object_class { 'My::RDBO::Advisory' }
  43 
  44 __PACKAGE__->make_manager_methods('advisory');
  45 
  46 1;
  47 
  48 ######################################################################
  49 package My::RDBO::AlertMethod;
  50 
  51 use strict;
  52 
  53 use base qw(My::RDBO);
  54 
  55 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
  56     table   => 'alert_methods',
  57 
  58     columns => [
  59         id        => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
  60         name      => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
  61         desc      => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 100, not_null => 1 },
  62         desc_long => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
  63     ],
  64 
  65     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
  66 
  67     unique_key => [ 'name' ],
  68 );
  69 
  70 1;
  71 ######################################################################
  72 package My::RDBO::AlertMethod::Manager;
  73 
  74 use base qw(Rose::DB::Object::Manager);
  75 
  76 use My::RDBO::AlertMethod;
  77 
  78 sub object_class { 'My::RDBO::AlertMethod' }
  79 
  80 __PACKAGE__->make_manager_methods('alert_methods');
  81

  84 ######################################################################
  85 package My::RDBO::App;
  86 
  87 use strict;
  88 
  89 use base qw(My::RDBO);
  90 
  91 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
  92     table   => 'app',
  93 
  94     columns => [
  95         id   => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
  96         name => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 150, not_null => 1 },
  97     ],
  98 
  99     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 100 
 101     unique_key => [ 'name' ],
 102 
 103     relationships => [
 104         advisory => {
 105             class      => 'My::RDBO::Advisory',
 106             column_map => { id => 'app_id' },
 107             type       => 'one to many',
 108         },
 109     ],
 110 );
 111 
 112 1;

 130 
 131 use base qw(My::RDBO);

 134     table   => 'app_version',
 135 
 136     columns => [
 137         id      => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 138         app_id  => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 139         version => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
 140     ],
 141 
 142     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 143 );

 159 ######################################################################
 160 package My::RDBO::Criteria;
 161 
 162 use strict;
 163 
 164 use base qw(My::RDBO);
 165 
 166 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
 167     table   => 'criteria',
 168 
 169     columns => [
 170         id   => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 171         name => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
 172         desc => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
 173         type => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
 174     ],
 175 
 176     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 177 
 178     unique_key => [ 'name' ],
 179 
 180     relationships => [
 181         user_criteria => {
 182             class      => 'My::RDBO::UserCriteria',
 183             column_map => { id => 'criteria_id' },
 184             type       => 'one to many',
 185         },
 186     ],
 187 );
 188 
 189 1;

 203 ######################################################################
 204 package My::RDBO::Message;
 205 
 206 use strict;
 207 
 208 use base qw(My::RDBO);
 209 
 210 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
 211     table   => 'message',
 212 
 213     columns => [
 214         id        => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 215         text      => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
 216         subject   => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 250, not_null => 1 },
 217         body      => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
 218         type_id   => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 219         source_id => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 220         processed => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 221     ],
 222 
 223     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 224 
 225     unique_keys => [
 226         [ 'subject' ],
 227         [ 'subject', 'source_id' ],
 228     ],
 229 
 230     relationships => [
 231         advisory => {
 232             class      => 'My::RDBO::Advisory',
 233             column_map => { id => 'message_id' },
 234             type       => 'one to many',
 235         },
 236     ],
 237 );
 238 
 239 1;

 266         desc => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
 267     ],

 288 ######################################################################
 289 package My::RDBO::Source;
 290 
 291 use strict;
 292 
 293 use base qw(My::RDBO);
 294 
 295 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
 296     table   => 'source',
 297 
 298     columns => [
 299         id        => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 300         name      => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
 301         url       => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 100, not_null => 1 },
 302         desc      => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 150, not_null => 1 },
 303         desc_long => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
 304         type_id   => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 305     ],
 306 
 307     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 308 
 309     unique_key => [ 'name', 'type_id' ],
 310 );
 311 
 312 1;

 326 ######################################################################
 327 package My::RDBO::UserAlertMethod;
 328 
 329 use strict;
 330 
 331 use base qw(My::RDBO);
 332 
 333 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
 334     table   => 'user_alert_methods',
 335 
 336     columns => [
 337         id              => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 338         userprofile_id  => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 339         alertmethods_id => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 340     ],
 341 
 342     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 343 
 344     unique_key => [ 'userprofile_id', 'alertmethods_id' ],
 345 );
 346 
 347 1;

 361 ######################################################################
 362 package My::RDBO::UserCriteria;
 363 
 364 use strict;
 365 
 366 use base qw(My::RDBO);
 367 
 368 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
 369     table   => 'user_criteria',
 370 
 371     columns => [
 372         id          => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 373         user_id     => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 374         criteria_id => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 375         value       => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
 376     ],
 377 
 378     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 379 
 380     foreign_keys => [
 381         criteria => {
 382             class       => 'My::RDBO::Criteria',
 383             key_columns => { criteria_id => 'id' },
 384         },
 385     ],
 386 );
 387

 406 
 407 use base qw(My::RDBO);
 408

 410     table   => 'user_profile',
 411 
 412     columns => [
 413         id          => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 414         user_id     => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 415         where_heard => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 250, not_null => 1 },
 416     ],
 417 
 418     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 419 
 420     unique_key => [ 'user_id' ],
 421 );

 440 use strict;
 441 
 442 use base qw(My::RDBO);
 443 
 444 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
 445     table   => 'user_sources',
 446 
 447     columns => [
 448         id             => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
 449         userprofile_id => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 450         source_id      => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
 451     ],
 452 
 453     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
 454 
 455     unique_key => [ 'userprofile_id', 'source_id' ],
 456 );
